original_text: You will be delivered up even by parents and brothers and relatives and friends, and some of you they will put to death.
korean_text: 심지어 부모와 형제와 친척과 벗이 너희를 넘겨 주어 너희 중의 몇을 죽이게 하겠고

sentences.original_text: You will be delivered up even by parents and brothers and relatives and friends
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 부모와 형제와 친척과 친구들에게조차 넘겨질 것이다

sentences.original_text: and some of you they will put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 중 어떤 이들은 죽임을 당할 것이다
